title: Quick Tab Bug Fixes v1.6.2.3
details:
Fixed 3 critical Quick Tab bugs in v1.6.2.3:

1. **Auto-Restore Bug (Bug #1)**: Added StateManager.addSilent() and hydrateSilent() for lazy rendering. QuickTabsManager._hydrateState() now uses hydrateSilent() to load Quick Tabs into memory WITHOUT rendering.

2. **Iframe Recursion Bug (Bug #2)**: Added iframe guard at TOP of content.js with helper functions (_isQuickTabParentFrame, _checkShouldSkipInitialization) to prevent browser crashes from infinite nesting.

3. **Manager Sync Bug (Bug #3)**: Added QuickTabWindow.updatePosition() and updateSize() methods (wrap setPosition/setSize with timestamps). Added UpdateHandler pending updates queue for Quick Tabs not yet rendered.
